songs.title: Heart On Fire
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
I'm falling in, I'm falling down
I wanna begin but I don't know how
To let you know how I'm feeling
I'm high on hope, yeah, I'm reeling

[Chorus]
And I won't let you go, now that you know
I've been crazy for you all this time
I've kept it close, always hoping
With a heart on fire

[Verse 1]
Hand in hand, sparkling eyes
The days are bright, but so are the nights
To let you know how I'm feeling
Once I was through, now I'm winning

[Chorus]
And I won't let you go, now that you know
I've been crazy for you all this time
I've kept it close, always hoping
With a heart on fire
